CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 15, 1952, pg. 10 reads: "Holy Cross Card Party Committee - The Rector and members of the card party committee of the Church of the Holy Cross are jubilant over the success of their card party at Chatham Street YWCA, Tuesday evening. Directed by W.P. Young, the play was snappy and competition keen.  Miss Lois Simms, assisted by Mrs. Earl Simms, secured enough worth while prizes to allow twelve prizes for each division of play, plus door prizes.  Pictured here, members of the excellent committee headed by Mrs. Agatha Simms, general chairman, and MRs. Mary T. Burwell, co-chairman.  Other members included Mesdames Eleanor Jones, Lelia Poe, Marion Gooden, Laulie Bolden, Eleanor Davis, Armenter Rudder, Edith Adams, Rema Hord, Gertrude Stokes, Viola Thomas, Aileen Sawyer, Thelma Allen, Edwina Harris, Donald Scott, John Wilson, J.E. Trower, Bertha Evans, Miss Aline Herd, and others.  Father Samuel D. Rudder, Rector. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of thirteen members of the Holy Cross Card Party Committee, including one wearing pinstriped dress, posed in Chatham Street YWCA for Church of the Holy Cross card party
